entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump It’s shame to be a president of a country who’s main comcern is burning of a flag instead of more pressing issues like 120,000 plus deaths due to COVID-19 and sky high unemployment.  Dude you’re focusing on the wrong thing.  Stop making 🤡 ass decisions already!!!
